moduleTitle: Module 3.1: Basics (Ohm's Law, Components, Schematics, Breadboard)

infoSections.text: A PCB (Printed Circuit Board) schematic is a diagram that represents the electrical components and their connections in a circuit design, specifically for a PCB. It visually shows how each component, such as resistors, capacitors, diodes, transistors, etc., is interconnected through electrical traces (wires) and how the circuit functions.
